titles.title: Ending PUSHOUT Act of 2025
Ending Punitive, Unfair, School-based Harm that is Overt and Unresponsive to Trauma Act of 2025
Ending PUSHOUT Act of 2025
A bill to reduce exclusionary discipline practices in schools, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
